meanings.definition: To provide examples or visual aids to clarify or explain something.
meanings.sent1: She is illustrating her point with colorful diagrams.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is illustrating the math problem on the board.
meanings.sent3: The cat is illustrating the concept of laziness by sleeping all day.
meanings.sent4: His actions are illustrating the saying 'actions speak louder than words'.
meanings.sent5: The vivid illustrations are illustrating the story beautifully.

meanings.definition: To show or demonstrate something clearly.
meanings.sent1: The experiment is illustrating the effects of gravity.
meanings.sent2: The map is illustrating the route to the destination.
meanings.sent3: The clown is illustrating how to juggle with colorful balls.
meanings.sent4: Her smile is illustrating her happiness to the world.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights are illustrating the excitement of the city.

meanings.definition: To decorate or enhance a text with pictures or drawings.
meanings.sent1: The book is illustrating the fairy tale with beautiful illustrations.
meanings.sent2: The magazine is illustrating the article with relevant images.
meanings.sent3: The cake is illustrating the birthday theme with edible decorations.
meanings.sent4: The garden is illustrating nature's beauty with blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The museum is illustrating history through captivating exhibits.
